topic: problem with import Radiance resutlt to ECOTECT
body:
I built a model in ECOTECT and exported to RADIANCE to calculate daylight
performance. However, when i finished and i imported the result file with
.OK extension to ECOTECT. I can not. ECOTECT said "invalid file format"
Furthermore, it is the same thing with DAYSIM, when i imported DA file. Can
anyone tell me what is the problem?


Best Regards!


Vincent
